content.html: Look, I'm boring myself having to repeat this... but language matters. I'm not "choosing to be more COVID cautious." That's not why I can't come to your event. For me & many folks, your event is INACCESSIBLE to us by not being COVID-safe.
content.value:
Look, I'm boring myself having to repeat this... but language matters.

I'm not "choosing to be more COVID cautious." That's not why I can't come to your event.

For me & many folks, your event is INACCESSIBLE to us by not being COVID-safe.
